title: SpringHill Suites Los Angeles Burbank/Downtown Encourages Fall Fun With Universal Studios Hollywood Package
text:
SpringHill Suites Los Angeles Burbank/Downtown
New hotel in Burbank offers two adult tickets to Universal Studios Hollywood, deluxe suites, free parking
BURBANK, Calif. , Oct. 8, The all-new SpringHill Suites Los Angeles Burbank/Downtown is making a name for itself in the fun hospitality marketplace with the introduction of an exciting Universal Studios Hollywood Experience Package.
Whether spurring a fall getaway or indulging in a little family fun before the holiday chaos, travelers are in for a weekend they'll never forget when they take advantage of a special deal from one of the newest hotels near North Hollywood . The Universal Studios Hollywood Experience Package invites guests to fuel their adventures with two one-day adult tickets to Universal Studios Hollywood, then wind down while enjoying free hotel parking (a $205 value) and deluxe accommodations from $279 to $409 per night. Additional Universal Studios tickets can be purchased at the hotel front desk for $95 and $87 for children ages 3 to 9. Price is subject to change. Available Thursday through Sunday now through June 30, 2016 , there's never been a better time to make some memories with loved ones.
Less than 6 miles from Universal Studios Hollywood, the hotel gives thrill-seekers easy access to all of the action they crave. For additional fun off-site , guests can tour television sets at Warner Bros. Studios, say hello to the furry friends at Los Angeles Zoo and Botanical Gardens, or catch a Los Angeles Dodger game at Dodger Stadium.
Recently opened, the hotel in Burbank, CA , offers today's travelers all of the modern amenities they desire in a boutique-style environment inspired by Hollywood itself. Following an adventure-filled day, sip on a hand-crafted cocktail at Nineteen 26 , a sophisticated yet inviting bar and lounge designed and named after the birth year of Marilyn Monroe . Visitors wishing to enjoy the outdoors can take a dip in the resort-style pool, enjoy a game of ping pong or over-sized chess, or socialize in plush lounge chairs surrounding the fire pits.
When it's time to retire, let relaxation lead the way in stylishly appointed suites . Featuring separate living and sleeping spaces, large work desks, kitchenettes and spa-like bathrooms, the suites allow guests to spread out and feel at home while enjoying contemporary-style furnishings, free Wi-Fi and luxurious bedding.
In the morning, start the big day off satisfied with a complimentary hot breakfast buffet, featuring everything from fluffy eggs to fresh fruit and cold cereal.
To take advantage of the Universal Studios Package, travelers must use promotional code XY0 when booking online or by calling 1-800-228-9290. Additional tickets to the theme park can be purchased at the hotel's front desk.
About SpringHill Suites Los Angeles Burbank/Downtown
SpringHill Suites Los Angeles Burbank/Downtown at 549 S. San Fernando Blvd. in Burbank, CA is within walking distance of downtown Burbank and near North Hollywood , Universal Studios, Warner Brothers and Disneyland. The hotel features 5 floors with 170 suites, 1 meeting room with 500 square feet of flexible event space, an outdoor pool, whirlpool and state-of-the-art fitness center. A breakfast buffet and high-speed Internet access are complimentary. For information, visit www.marriott.com/BURSH or call 1-818-524-2730.
